disp-quote.p: When heavy rains come and the tide is high, the portion of [ barangay] Suba facing the mountains is really affected. The sea waters will go through houses [â€¦]. I experienced it. That was a rainy day. Three days raining with high tides. Then water came into our dining room and rose up to the knee level. But I left the house since. I decided I will no longer experience this.
